title: Erratum: Li, M., et al. Middle East Respiratory Syndrome and Medical Students: Letter from China. Int. J. Environ. Res. Public Health 2015, 12, 13289–13294
body:
We wish to make the following correction to the published paper [1]. The corresponding author’s name is incorrect. It should be “Wenjie Sun”, not “Sun Wenjie”.

We apologize to the authors of the article and readers of the journal for any inconvenience.
